turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Monarch (1800 ship).
turn.1: What year was the Monarch launched?
turn.2: Monarch (1800 ship) Monarch was built at Quebec in 1800.
turn.3: Where did the Monarch first sail?
turn.4: She sailed to England where under new ownership she proceeded to make five voyages for the British East India Company (EIC) as an "extra ship", that is, under charter.
turn.5: When did the Monarch stop being used?
turn.6: In 1813 she became a transport, and then in 1818 or so a regular merchantman.

turn.10: "Monarch" was the first large vessel built at Quebec.
turn.11: Who was the captain of the Monarch?
